entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
